Key Match Events: Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller's 79-run fifth-wicket stand
Keshav Maharaj's three full tosses in the final over
Mahmudullah's missed flick leading to a dead ball and no runs added
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa maintained a 100% win record at the T20 World Cup 2024
Bangladesh fell short by four runs
Maharaj's final over resulted in two wickets
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh almost forced a Super Over due to a missed leg byes call
Tanzim Hasan, Taskin Ahmed, and Rishad Hossain gave away just 13 runs in the last three overs
David Miller's efforts were recognized on his 35th birthday
Others: Quinton de Kock, Reeza Hendricks, and Aiden Markram's batting line-up has underperformed
South Africa's top three have collectively scored 61 runs in nine innings at an average of 6.77
Bangladesh need to improve their top-order performance
